Dialogue.Page: (RIEBEKC_START_1) Oh, hello! Are you here to help?

DialogueOption.Text: (RIEBEC_START_2) Just... how? I mean... how you are here?
(RIEBECK_START_3) Yep, my ship should be near, let's get in.
(RIEBECK_START_4) Hold on, I'll take ship little closer.
(RIEBECK_START_5) I'm so sorry... but ship is not functioning... Unfortunately I can't help.

Dialogue.Page: (RIEBECK_START_6) Well, I'd see how you react if piece of planet will fall right behind you!
(RIEBECK_START_7) I had no time to react so I took all gravity crystals I have and found safe place. Logically, from this side I will not fall DOWN.

DialogueOption.Text: (RIEBECK_START_7) I got you, Riebec glad to see you're alive and... safe. Kind of.

Dialogue.Page: (RIEBECK_START_10) So... can you help me then?

DialogueOption.Text: (RIEBECK_START_4) Don't go anywhere, I'll take ship closer.
(RIEBECK_START_5) I'm so sorry... but ship is not functioning... Unfortunately I can't help.

Dialogue.Page: (RIEBEC_START_8) Of course! Just be careful here.
(RIEBEC_START_9) Damn it.. I guess I'll stay here for a while then...
